column4: i just installed ubuntu and i cannot mount my 2nd hard drive   it's a EXT3 partition i did mkdir /mnt/mount/ but now there's commands that i forget to finish mounting this thing. Also, i'd like to know how to add this device in fstab
is it an ntfs or fat32 partition?  or just linux part?
that page has good instructions to look at.  The last one ubotu sent you.
